concept.description: Labels all fields annotated by @jakarta.decorator.Delegate with "Decorator" and "Delegate".
concept.cypher: MATCH (delegate:Field)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(delegateType:Type) WHERE delegateType.fqn="jakarta.decorator.Delegate" SET delegate:Decorator:Delegate RETURN delegate AS Delegate

concept.description: Labels all types annotated by @jakarta.decorator.Decorator with "Decorator".
concept.cypher: MATCH (decorator:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(decoratorType:Type) WHERE decoratorType.fqn="jakarta.decorator.Decorator" SET decorator:Decorator RETURN decorator AS Decorator
